mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members (id, password, nickname, birthday, gender, status, phone, image, is_admin) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{status}, #{phone}, #{image}, #{isAdmin})
mapper.select: select id as username, password, case when status = 'active' then true else false end as enabled, case when is_admin = '0' then false when is_admin = '1' then true end as isAdmin from members where id = #{username}
